column5: Lakeside Log Cabin, Yamaha Ski Boat and Wave Runner on the shores of Richland Chambers Lake. I am interested in building a lasting experience for guests enjoying water sports, sunset boat rides to the Harbor Inn Restaurant and Wave Runner fun. Private dock is available for endless fishing and swimming. Chef's menu includes Mexican, Mediterranean, Italian and Smores. Specialized knowledge of Wines, Beers and Specialty Drinks. Lake Hair Don't Care!  Life Is Short, Make Fun Of It!!
column8: Cozy Lakeside Log Cabin and Watersports
